alert.note: Alert for Itawamba; Prentiss; Tishomingo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 3:46PM CDT until July 21 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Itawamba County in northeastern Mississippi... Southern Tishomingo County in northeastern Mississippi... Southeastern Prentiss County in northeastern Mississippi... * Until 415 PM CDT. * At 346 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Sandy Springs, or 12 miles north of Fulton, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fulton, Red Bay, Belmont, Tremont, Sandy Springs, Fairview, Clay, Golden, Eastman, Dennis, Moores Mill, Bounds Crossroads, Neil and Bloody Springs. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
